plot: A young man meets a woman on the beach. It could have been the beginning of a beautiful relationship, if fate hadn't decided on different plans for both of them.
title: No Chance
plot_es: A young man meets a woman on the beach. It could have been the beginning of a beautiful relationship, if fate hadn't decided on different plans for both of them.
